Package fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.cloudhopper

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SmppClientSupplier
    A functional interface to provide an instance of a SmppClient.
    SmppSessionHandlerSupplier
    A functional interface to provide an instance of a SmppSessionHandler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloudhopperBuilder
    Configures Cloudhopper: SMPP protocol parameters (host, port, systemId, password, version...) Session management (name, bind, timeouts, retry...) SSL configuration Logging options
    CloudhopperRetryablePredicates  
    CloudhopperSessionOptions
    Intermediate object that carries configured options.
    DataCodingSchemeBuilder
    Data Coding Scheme is a one-octet field in Short Messages (SM) and Cell Broadcast Messages (CB) which carries a basic information how the recipient handset should process the received message.
    DefaultCloudhopperConfigurer
    Default configurer for Cloudhoppder that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard().
    DefaultCloudhopperConfigurer.CloudhopperConfigurer  
    EncoderBuilder
    Configures text message encoding: It supports GSM 03.38 standard encodings.
    KeepAliveBuilder
    Builder to configure how keep alive session management should behave.
    LoggingBuilder
    * Configure logs: Enable/disable log of Pdus Enable/disable log of bytes
    MessageSplitterBuilder
    Configures how Cloudhopper will split messages.
    ReadableEncoderBuilder
    Encoding configuration is shared between CloudhopperBuilder and MessageSplitterBuilder.
    ReferenceNumberGeneratorBuilder
    In the cellular phone industry, mobile phones and their networks sometimes support concatenated short message service (or concatenated SMS) to overcome the limitation on the number of characters that can be sent in a single SMS text message transmission (which is usually 160).
    ReuseSessionBuilder
    Builder to configure how reuse session management should behave.
    SessionBuilder
    Configures Cloudhopper session management (timeouts, retry, session name...).
    SslBuilder
    Enable or disable SSL configuration and configure how SSL is handled.
    StandardEncodingHelper
    Helper class that extends ConfigurationValueBuilderHelper to track the associated charset name.
    UserDataBuilder
    "User Data" represents the text message or data to be transmitted the end-user.
    UserDataBuilder.UserDataPropValues
    Simple data class to provide configured values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InterfaceVersion
    Wraps the version for builder
